QuestData.Title: Return to Honor Hold
QuestData.Description: $n, while you were on your mission in Zeth'Gor, I received news of my commanding officer, Colonel Jules. He was stricken with a demonic corruption while fighting near the Gor'gaz Outpost, and his situation has grown very bad.$B$BYou have made such great gains for us against the fel orcs. Your strength in battle is without question... is your spirit just as strong?$B$BPlease, return to Honor Hold and speak with Klatu, in an upper room at the Honor Hold inn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Assistant Klatu, at Honor Hold's inn.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, it is true. Colonel Jules' situation has grown much worse these past days. Anchorite Barada is busy praying for him... let us hope he may be cured.
